PowerToys: Batman utility belt for Windows

Nov 27, 2022

Microsoft PowerToys is a collection of very handy utilities for Windows, where "very handy" means "Grrr why don't these come with Windows by default?".

These are some of my favourite PowerToys:

  • Image Resizer: Via a right click in File Explorer.
  • PowerRename: Easy batch file renaming, again via a right click in File Explorer.
  • Color Picker: Like Digital Colour Meter on MacOS
  • PowerToys Run: app launcher like Spotlight on MacOS

Highly recommended.
